name: Shanghai Tower (China) - Simplified Model
description: Second tallest (632 m); double-skin facade, mega-columns, tuned mass damper
reference_sources: Guo et al. 2014: Shanghai Tower: Design and Construction of the World's Second Tallest Building (CTBUH)
expected_outputs: Max story drift under design wind (±5%)
notes: Reference data from CTBUH conference publications; wind pressures from aerodynamic testing summary
